attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We now have footballers earning in excess of £80,000 per week for playing football.This is having a knock on effect and taking football from the man in the street whose contributions over the years to keep the game viable,NO footballer is worth more than £2,000 per week to play a game of football,no matter who he is.Never mind £80,000+.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
